message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive day for mid/small caps with leadership in pharma (Laurus, Lupin, Biocon), exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL), and capital goods (Voltas). PSU metals mixed: SAIL cooled below 145 trigger; HINDCOPPER steady at 333–336. Our book closed at ₹27,569.8 with BSE and Laurus strong; LTF recovered to ₹294.15 but remains a concentration risk (~30% of portfolio). Into Monday: watch BSE > 2,835, SAIL > 145.2, BEL > 430.5, BHEL > 290, IndusTower > 414; keep tight stops.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Trim/Trail", "reason": "Position still ~30% of book; closed below 300. Trail with stop near 289; trim into strength to de-risk.", "price": 294.15},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Add on breakout/dip", "reason": "Exchange/depository theme strong; add on breakout > 2,835 or controlled dip to 2,770–2,790 with stop ~2,680.", "price": 2827.60},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Add on retest/strength", "reason": "Holding above 1,600; prefer dip to 1,608–1,620 or strength > 1,660. Stop ~1,515.", "price": 1625.80},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Add on strength", "reason": "Range 422–432; cleaner momentum above 430.5 with stop ~404.", "price": 426.85},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Add on breakout", "reason": "PSU/defence bid intact; add only on decisive move above 290 with stop ~276.", "price": 281.60},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Buy on breakout or buy-the-dip", "reason": "Continuation setup above 145.2; alternatively accumulate 140–142 with stop ~137.5.", "price": 141.99},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on strength", "reason": "Momentum intact; trail stop ~965. Add only on sustained break above 1,005.", "price": 999.00},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Tight base under 414–415; strength through this zone can open next leg. Stop ~392 on fresh buys.", "price": 412.35},
    {"symbol": "VOLTAS", "signal": "Buy on continuation/pullback", "reason": "Range expansion day; consider dips to 1,330–1,340 or strength > 1,386. Risk manage with stop ~1,298.", "price": 1350.90},
    {"symbol": "JUBLFOOD", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Constructive structure; trigger above 623 with stop ~599 for a swing.", "price": 615.30},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Momentum buy (dip/strength)", "reason": "High-volume move; buy dips to 111–112 or strength > 116.6 with stop ~107.5.", "price": 114.14},
    {"symbol": "BIOCON", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Pharma leadership broadening; better risk-reward on a push above 419–420. Stop ~402–405.", "price": 411.15}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Risk management: trim oversized position and reduce portfolio concentration.", "quantity": 8, "price": "Sell MKT on strength 300–302; else SL-M 288.80"},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Add within strong exchange/depository theme on a controlled dip.", "quantity": 1, "price": "LMT 1,615 (dip buy); SL 1,515"},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Breakout continuation if 145.2 clears; diversify away from NBFC concentration.", "quantity": 10, "price": "Buy stop 145.20; LMT 146.50; SL 137.50"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 969.80,
    "total_value": 27569.80,
    "holdings_count": 8,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ ₹2385.00 (CMP ₹2827.60)",
      "LTF: 28 units @ ₹275.59 (CMP ₹294.15)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ ₹419.45 (CMP ₹426.85)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ ₹900.05 (CMP ₹999.00)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ ₹265.49 (CMP ₹281.60)",
      "NHPC: 30 units @ ₹81.48 (CMP ₹80.30)",
      "SAIL: 10 units @ ₹144.05 (CMP ₹141.99)",
      "CDSL: 1 units @ ₹1600.90 (CMP ₹1625.80)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Pharma: Leadership persists (LAURUSLABS, LUPIN, BIOCON, ALKEM). Prefer adds only on strength; trail winners.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE near breakout, CDSL holding >1600; MCX extended—buy only on deeper dips.",
    "PSU/Defence: BHEL add >290; BEL needs >430.5; HAL trend up—buy retests near 4,700.",
    "Metals: SAIL under 145.2 trigger; HINDCOPPER stable above ~333—buy dips with tight stops.",
    "Telecom towers: INDUSTOWER eyeing 414–415 breakout; good R:R with stop ~392.",
    "Discretionary/Durables: VOLTAS showed strong expansion; JUBLFOOD needs >623 for confirmation.",
    "NBFCs: LTF volatile; manage with 289 trail. ABCAPITAL constructive around 329–334; consider retest buys with stop ~324.",
    "IT/ER&D: KPITTECH cooled to 1,222—wait for strength; PERSISTENT/MPHASIS range-bound.",
    "Utilities: NHPC weak within 80–83 range; avoid adds until it reclaims 82.5+ with volume.",
    "Rail/Infra: RVNL constructive >325.5; IRCON firm but extended—prefer pullbacks.",
    "Real estate/Shipyards: MAZDOCK/GRSE trends intact; avoid chasing fresh highs—buy dips.",
    "High volume movers to watch: NBCC, IDEA (speculative—avoid chasing), ASHOKLEY, VOLTAS.",
    "Risk controls (current holdings): LTF 289 trail; BSE ref risk 2,680; BEL 404; BHEL 276; LAURUS 965; NHPC 79.5; SAIL 137.5; CDSL 1,515.",
    "Execution: If Monday gaps >0.7%, wait 20–30 minutes for the range to form; prefer pullback entries over chasing."
  ]
}
